text: Kampong Limau Manis is a village in Pengkalan Batu, a mukim in Brunei-Muara District, Brunei. The postcode for Kampong Limau Manis is BH2323. == Name == Kampong Limau Manis comes from the same name in Malay which translates as 'Limau Manis Village'. == References == Batu Ampar
title: Kampong Limau Manis
